spiritAshes.description: Spirit Ashes in Elden Ring are companions summoned by the Spirit Calling Bell to aid in Combat. They can be upgraded through Roderika and with the new Revered Spirit Ashes system in Shadow of the Erdtree DLC.

conditions: Must be near a Rebirth Monument
Cannot be used in Multiplayer Coop
Cannot resummon in same area until resting at Sites of Grace
Cannot be active with Furlcalling Finger Remedy effects

allAshes.name: Mimic Tear
allAshes.notes: Elite. Mimics the summoner's loadout (inc. spells + consumables), unlimited FP

allAshes.name: Black Knife Tiche
allAshes.notes: Elite. Melee, Highly mobile and survivable, Range applies Destined Death

allAshes.name: Dung Eater Puppet
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee, AoE Enemy Defense and Status Resistance Debuff, Shoot Wraiths at Range and Tanky

allAshes.name: Jolán and Anna
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee, 1 Range. Very strong Bleed and pressure. Expensive FP Cost

allAshes.name: Latenna the Albinauric
allAshes.notes: Elite. Magic Range, Extremely high DPS and range but immobile. Low HP

allAshes.name: Omenkiller Rollo
allAshes.notes: Elite. Fire AoE, Bleed Melee, High damage and pressure, Tanky

allAshes.name: Stormhawk Deenh
allAshes.notes: Elite. Buffs in an AoE immediately upon summoning as well as periodically after, Flying, Highly mobile and great distraction

allAshes.name: Inquisitor Ashes
allAshes.notes: Melee, Fire Range, 1 Supportive with unlimited AoE healing. 1 Offensive with a self-buff for more damage

allAshes.name: Ancient Dragon Florissax
allAshes.notes: Elite. Casts Dragonbolt of Florissax upon summon. Lightning Melee and Range. Dragon Incantation Melee with High Stagger. Supportive type, follows you

allAshes.name: Perfumer Tricia
allAshes.notes: Elite. Shield and Buff for Summoner, Fire Range and Melee, Inconsistent damage but high sustain/buff potential

allAshes.name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
allAshes.notes: Elite. AoE Heal, Range, Low damage. Sustain type summon

allAshes.name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff
allAshes.notes: Elite. Shield. Melee and Lightning Range, Extremely Tanky. Uses Lightning to deal damage from afar and buff self. Uses Rejection in Melee

allAshes.name: Blackflame Monk Amon
allAshes.notes: Elite. Fire Melee and Close Ranged Magic. Uses Black Flame magic in attacks, doing %HP damage. Strong AoE

allAshes.name: Demi-Human Swordsman Yosh
allAshes.notes: Elite. Melee, Highly Mobile, High Damage with great Pressure

allAshes.name: Divine Bird Warrior Ornis
allAshes.notes: Elite. Melee, Holy Range. High pressure and Nigh Invulnerability during special attack

allAshes.name: Banished Knight Oleg
allAshes.notes: Elite. Good mobility, Tanky. High Stagger damage and pressure

allAshes.name: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
allAshes.notes: Elite. Inflicts Sleep, Range, Fantastic crowd control

allAshes.name: Messmer Soldier Ashes
allAshes.notes: Melee. High Stagger. Strong Combo Potential. Never allow themselves to become separated

allAshes.name: Nightmaiden & Swordstress Puppets
allAshes.notes: Elite, Long-Range Melee. Good mobility, great crowd control. Uses Sleep Magic

allAshes.name: Redmane Knight Ogha
allAshes.notes: Elite. Ranged Knockback. Instantly aggressive. Swaps to Shield with Melee when Enemy is close. Will react to the player's War Cry skill uniquely

allAshes.name: Bigmouth Imp Ashes
allAshes.notes: Explosive Range with Special High Knockback. Weak Melee. Low HP. (Special Knockback seems to affect some bosses)

allAshes.name: Nepheli Loux Puppet
allAshes.notes: Elite. Melee. High poise damage. Uses Lightning spinning attacks to imbue weapons

allAshes.name: Horned Warrior Ashes
allAshes.notes: Melee, High Stagger, Strong Knockback with Pressure, Great vs. Smaller and Humanoid targets

allAshes.name: Azula Beastmen
allAshes.notes: Lightning Melee. Very high damage, not much survivability. Reckless Glass Cannons

allAshes.name: Bloodhound Knight Floh
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee. Instantly Aggressive. Highly mobile, high DPS

allAshes.name: Black Knight Commander Andreas
allAshes.notes: Elite. Holy Melee, Holy Range. Very Tanky, High Stagger with Guard Counters

allAshes.name: Mausoleum Soldiers
allAshes.notes: 3 Shields. 2 Greatswords. Extreme survivability, teleportation, Not very aggressive but still good Damage

allAshes.name: Swordhand of Night Jolán
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee. Strong Special attack

allAshes.name: Curseblade Meera
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee, Range, Mobile

allAshes.name: Fire Knight Queelign
allAshes.notes: Elite. Fire Melee and Range. Instantly Aggressive

allAshes.name: Banished Knight Engvall
allAshes.notes: Elite. Fairly aggressive, tanky, melee range AoE crowd control, and can interrupt/pin small single targets

allAshes.name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay
allAshes.notes: Elite. Bleed Melee, Holy Range with small Rot AoE. Decently mobile with high DPS. Buffs you with hp/s + Fire Resist. Expensive summon cost

allAshes.name: Black Knight Captain Huw
allAshes.notes: Elite. Holy Melee, Mobile, Tanky

allAshes.name: Radahn Soldier
allAshes.notes: Fire Melee and Ranged. Great damage. Instantly Aggressive. Can work as a light source

allAshes.name: Avionette Soldier
allAshes.notes: Bleed Melee, Fire Ranged. Chance to Malfunction when damaged

allAshes.name: Kaiden Sellsword
allAshes.notes: Melee, High Pressure, Reckless. Self-buffs, similar to the enemy variant

allAshes.name: Bloodfiend Hexer's Ashes
allAshes.notes: AoE Bleed Ranged, Normal and Bleed Melee when in Danger. Costs HP to summon

allAshes.name: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan
allAshes.notes: Elite. Fire Mid-Range and Melee. Poison Aoe cloud attack. Self buffs. Can heal self once for 50% max HP

allAshes.name: Demi-Human
allAshes.notes: Versatile, great distractions. More Aggressive at Night

allAshes.name: Man-Serpent
allAshes.notes: Fire AoE and melee. Good range, decent damage with Sea of Magma ability

allAshes.name: Oracle Envoy
allAshes.notes: Holy Range. Melee. Decent backline damage. Okay Melee damage when in danger

allAshes.name: Ancestral Follower
allAshes.notes: High Damage Magical Range, Melee when in danger

allAshes.name: Man-Fly Ashes
allAshes.notes: 2 Melee, 1 Poison Range. Low FP Cost for Efficiency. Great Distractions

allAshes.name: Jarwight Puppet
allAshes.notes: Elite. Range, Uses all types of throwable pots from the base game to attack and inflict status. Some of which include Bleed, Poison, Deadly Poison, Fire, Oil, and Frost

allAshes.name: Gravebird Ashes
allAshes.notes: Melee, Frost Range, Easily Staggered. Ghostflame can proc frostbite

allAshes.name: Mad Pumpkin Head
allAshes.notes: Bleed Melee, Very Tanky. Can friendly fire with multi-headslam attack

allAshes.name: Kindred of Rot
allAshes.notes: Melee, Pest Threads Range. Recieves a Damage buff upon any Scarlet Rot Procs in the vicinity

allAshes.name: Fire Monk
allAshes.notes: Melee, Close Range Fire Magic, Good AoE

allAshes.name: Fanged Imp
allAshes.notes: Magic Range and Bleed Melee. Mobile and decent distractions

allAshes.name: Warhawk
allAshes.notes: Flying, Melee. Highly mobile, Fire AoE ability. Good damage. Easily Staggered

allAshes.name: Giant Rat
allAshes.notes: Melee. Costs no HP or FP, well rounded. Number of Rats increases as upgraded. (has preset locations for boss arenas)

allAshes.name: Albinauric
allAshes.notes: Melee. Frost AoE breath attack. Surprisingly mobile

allAshes.name: Rotten Stray
allAshes.notes: Melee, inflicts Scarlet Rot. Low HP but low Summon Cost. Value goes up the weaker your foe is to rot

allAshes.name: Crystalian
allAshes.notes: Melee, Range. Extremely tanky until staggered once. High Poise

allAshes.name: Fire Knight Hilde
allAshes.notes: Elite. Melee. Fire Range. Easily Staggered. Blocks occasional small attacks

allAshes.name: Fingercreeper Ashes
allAshes.notes: Casts a heal upon summoning. Weak Melee. Supportive type summon that follows you casting healing spells. Is stunned by and weak to fire

allAshes.name: Godrick Soldiers
allAshes.notes: Both have shields, Both have Melee, one uses a crossbow when at range

allAshes.name: Vulgar Militia
allAshes.notes: Bleed Melee. Low HP

allAshes.name: Archer
allAshes.notes: Frost Range. Inaccurate against Mobile Targets

allAshes.name: Marionette Soldiers
allAshes.notes: Range, Instantly Aggressive. Chance to Malfunction when Damaged

allAshes.name: Leyndell Soldiers
allAshes.notes: Shield and Melee. Good survivability, decent poise damage with Guard Counters

allAshes.name: Skeletal Militiaman
allAshes.notes: Melee, Self-Revive

allAshes.name: Lone Wolf
allAshes.notes: Melee. Highly mobile, great distractions

allAshes.name: Battlemage Hugues
allAshes.notes: Elite. AoE and Single-Target Magic. Aoe Magical Melee and Normal Melee strikes. Too Expensive

allAshes.name: Land Squirt
allAshes.notes: Poison Cloud, Mostly Stationary. Very Tanky (has preset locations for boss arenas) Costs HP to summon

allAshes.name: Raya Lucaria Soldiers
allAshes.notes: Melee and Magic Range. Greatsword one throws cuckoo pots but isn't very aggressive as a result

allAshes.name: Twinsage Sorcerer
allAshes.notes: Long and Close Range Magic. Weak Melee

allAshes.name: Haligtree Soldiers
allAshes.notes: Melee. Can buildup poison with thrown pots. Explode and die when at half health for big damage in an AoE

allAshes.name: Putrid Corpse
allAshes.notes: Melee Grappler, Very Tanky. Strong distraction summons. (has preset locations for boss arenas)

allAshes.name: Nomad
allAshes.notes: Fire short-ranged AoE. Uses Frenzied Flame attacks that inflict Madness. Useful in the Arena

allAshes.name: Spirit Jellyfish
allAshes.notes: Poison Range, Weak Melee, Flying, Decently Healthy

allAshes.name: Clayman
allAshes.notes: Magic Range, Slow and Slow Magic, Slightly Tanky

allAshes.name: Page
allAshes.notes: Fire Range and Melee. Too Expensive FP Cost

allAshes.name: Winged Misbegotten
allAshes.notes: Inaccurate Range, Flying (Until Staggered once), Very Easily Staggered

allAshes.name: Skeletal Bandit
allAshes.notes: Melee, Self-Revive

allAshes.name: Spider Scorpion Ashes
allAshes.notes: Melee. Doesn't use stinger enough to Poison. (has preset locations for boss arenas)

allAshes.name: Glintstone Sorcerer
allAshes.notes: Magic Range. Weak Melee. Casts one spell

allAshes.name: Soldjars of Fortune
allAshes.notes: Melee, Instantly die upon receiving any Fire Damage. Tanky outside of Fire Damage. Costs HP to summon

allAshes.name: Miranda Sprout
allAshes.notes: Weak Poison Cloud, Weak Melee, Very Slow. Costs HP to summon

allAshes.name: Wandering Noble
allAshes.notes: Melee, Slow. Decent Distractions

allAshes.name: Noble Sorcerer
allAshes.notes: Magical Range, Slow. Low Damage
